quotes.quote: Imagination is the beginning of creation. You imagine what you desire, you will what you imagine and at last you create what you will.
You can't depend on your eyes when your imagination is out of focus.
Imagination will often carry us to worlds that never were. But without it we go nowhere.
Everything you can imagine is real.
I imagine that yes is the only living thing.
To treat your facts with imagination is one thing, to imagine your facts is another.
Imagination grows by exercise, and contrary to common belief, is more powerful in the mature than in the young.
I imagine, therefore I belong and am free.
Logic will get you from A to Z; imagination will get you everywhere.
Imagination does not become great until human beings, given the courage and the strength, use it to create.
Imagination is the golden-eyed monster that never sleeps. It must be fed; it cannot be ignored.
Imagination is everything. It is the preview of life's coming attractions.
Reason is intelligence taking exercise. Imagination is intelligence with an erection.
Because when you are imagining, you might as well imagine something worth while.
Imagination means nothing without doing.
The imagination is a palette of bright colors. You can use it to touch up memories ? or you can use it to paint dreams.
Nothing encourages creativity like the chance to fall flat on one's face.
The creative person is both more primitive and more cultivated, more destructive, a lot madder and a lot saner, than the average person.
Sometimes imagination pounces; mostly it sleeps soundly in the corner, purring.
He who has imagination without learning has wings but no feet.
Imagination is the highest kite one can fly.
Perhaps imagination is only intelligence having fun.
I believe in the imagination. What I cannot see is infinitely more important than what I can see.
Those who do not think outside the box are easily contained.
Creative minds have always been known to survive any kind of bad training.
To think creatively, we must be able to look afresh at what we normally take for granted.
Imagination governs the world.
Imagination was given to man to compensate him for what he is not; a sense of humor to console him for what he is.
The imagination is man's power over nature.
My imagination makes me human and makes me a fool; it gives me all the world and exiles me from it.
The imagination, give it the least license, dives deeper and soars higher than Nature goes.
Imagination is an inner resource. That's why it takes stopping, slowing, silencing, reassuring, embracing to allow it to speak.
Imagination is actually a form of computation. Imagination gives calculated and instinctive solutions for the future.
It is better to have enough ideas for some of them to be wrong, than to be always right by having no ideas at all.
Imagination is the voice of daring. If there is anything godlike about God, it is that. He dared to imagine everything
Fantasy was always only a reality waiting to be switched on.
The true sign of intelligence is not knowledge but imagination.
The power of imagination makes us infinite.
All the works of man have their origin in creative fantasy. What right have we then to depreciate imagination.
Imagination disposes of everything; it creates beauty, justice, and happiness, which is everything in this world.
The quality of the imagination is to flow and not to freeze.
Imagination is not a talent of some people but is the health of everyone.
Imagination is a poor matter when it has to part company with understanding.
Only in men's imagination does every truth find an effective and undeniable existence. Imagination, not invention, is the supreme master of art as of life.

Imagination is always the fabric of social life and the dynamic of history. The influence of real needs and compulsions, of real interests and materials, is indirect because the crowd is never conscious of it.
The imagination is never governed, it is always the ruling and divine power.
A strong imagination begetteth opportunity.
The imagination is the secret and marrow of civilization.
Imagination allows you to see things in a non-traditional, non-restrictive manner. Your imagination is your picture of what tomorrow may bring.
Imagination is the only key to the future. Without it none exists - with it all things are possible.
